title: Declaring Independence
question_text: Which of the following describes two events that are most likely to be independent?

choices.text:
Picking two “Kings” on two successive selections (without replacement) of cards from a well shuffled, standard
52
-card deck.
Selecting one penny from a change jar and then selecting a quarter from the same jar.
Randomly selecting one of the states in the United States to do a report on, and randomly selecting one of the countries of Europe to do a report on.

Randomly selecting
2
 males
from a class consisting of
8
 males
and
11
 females
.

Picking a number from
1
to
10
when guessing which number your sister has written down on a piece of paper, and then picking a different number if you find that your first guess was wrong.
